attributes.action: To  Honour Henry Allington for "Service to his country" by knighting him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a government you honour morally corrupt Bankers and fellow MP's, especially those who in the past wanted the House of Lords abolished(example:Kinnock)But you fail to rightfully honour the very people who fought to give you the opportunity to get university education and the free speach rights. Your systematic abuse of power is a virus of corruption. Henry Allington was a brave and courageous englishman no if's or but's.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
